title: Lose email
body: Hey, you can help me? My brother create my account with her email and he don't tell me the email and now he left in London (I'm from Romania). You can help me? I want to change password because a guy knows my password.

replies.body: We don't support account trading or sharing, so technically if your brother created it then it would be his.  You can reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to see if our account team can help at all.  Can't make any guarantees, though!
